description:
The Komperdell Carbon C7 Pro Adjustable Poles are lightweight and durable poles that can be adjusted to suit different terrain and conditions.

  • 3-section design with a carbon upper part, a carbon middle part, and a Titanal lower part
  • A Powerlock 3.0 mechanism allows easy and secure adjustment of the pole length
  • The Touring 2-K foam grip provides comfort and control
  • They have a Comfort Padded strap that is soft and ergonomic
  • The Ice-flex basket adapts to the slope inclination up to 28 degrees
  • They have a Vario tungsten/carbide flex tip that offers durability and traction on different surfaces
name: Komperdell Carbon C7 Pro Adjustable Poles
